sentences.en: A metal called uranium gave off a kind of radiation.
sentences.cn: 一种叫铀的金属会发出一种射线.

sentences.en: And if you keep these neutrons from escaping through leakage they then become available to become absorbed in uranium 238.
sentences.cn: 如果你阻止这些中子通过泄露逃跑,它们之后能够,变成在铀238里能吸收的。

sentences.en: At Scinto 6 uranium occurs in much altered dolerite below the unconformity.
sentences.cn: “辛托6”的铀矿体产于不整合面之下变质甚深的粒玄岩中.

sentences.en: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 浓缩铀是核武器的关键组成部分。

sentences.en: It was actually used for enriching uranium to weapons-grade levels.
sentences.cn: 实际上，它是用来将铀浓缩以制造武器。

sentences.en: Now as you recall from the uranium 238 slide, and I think the next slide will show it.
sentences.cn: 现在，如你们能在铀238的幻灯片中想起的，我想，下一张幻灯片就会展示它。

sentences.en: Only 7 uranium atoms of every 1,000 are U - 235.
sentences.cn: 在每1000个铀原子当中,只有七个是铀235.

sentences.en: Pitchblende and chalcolite are much more radioactive than uranium itself.
sentences.cn: 沥清铀矿和铜铀云母比纯铀的放射性强得多.

sentences.en: Radiogenic heat, even from a fairly deep - seated uranium orebody, could be measured.
sentences.cn: 即使铀矿体埋得足够深,它的放射成因热也能被测出.

sentences.en: Radiometric techniques are not always appropriate to the earth for uranium deposits.
sentences.cn: 放射性方法在铀矿普查中并不总是有效的.

sentences.en: The concept holds that uranium is leached by groundwater from tuffeceous rocks.
sentences.cn: 该理论认为,来自凝灰岩的地下水淋蚀铀.

sentences.en: The earliest production reactors necessarily used normal uranium as fuel.
sentences.cn: 最早为生产用的反应堆,必须使用普通铀作为燃料.

sentences.en: The fuel was enriched with uranium 235 for the nuclear reactor.
sentences.cn: 核反应堆的燃料被铀235浓缩。

sentences.en: They went over nationwide in search of uranium mines.
sentences.cn: 他们为了探寻铀矿走遍了全国.

sentences.en: To make the fissile material, he needs to develop an ability to enrich uranium.
sentences.cn: 为了得到分裂物质，他需要发展浓缩铀的能力。

sentences.en: Uranium is available in considerable quantity from various areas of the world.
sentences.cn: 世界上许多地区都有相当数量的铀储量。

sentences.en: Uranium is soluble in sea water.
Uranium minerals also occur in the basal beds of the kombolgie formation.
sentences.cn: 铀矿物也见于科姆波尔吉建造的基底层位中.

trans.tran_en: a heavy white metal that is radioactive and is used to produce nuclear power and nuclear weapons. It is a chemical element: symbol U
